Burning Hammer: Great! Great! What can I do?

Burning Hammer was acting immature and kind. The exact opposite of what he
was before...

----- Original Message -----
From: <airly2000@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, April 04, 2001 8:54 PM
Subject: Re: meeting a old friend


> Trinity/Windlord:
>
> "You're a nice bot, Grounded" Said Trinity.
>
> Windlord looked to Burning Hammer "Of course you can help us Burning
> hammer"
>
> Trinity walked happy around them..
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > ::Grounded::
> > "Thank you windlord" he siad starting to follow him.
> > "Ill play tag with you in a bit young one.."
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > > Windlord/Trinity:::
> > >
> > > "Follow me..." replied Winlord while he started walk "Lab might be
> > > around Cr's room"
> > >
> > > "Hey Grounded, do you wanna play Tag?" said Trinity.
> > >
> > > "We need to do somethings before, Trinity" replied Windlord
> > >
> > > "Can I help, can I help?" said Trinity with a childish tone "Ohhh.
> > > pleaseeeee... I wanna help!!!"
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > > > ::Grounded::
> > > > "The name is Grounded cat bot.." he said to Trinity. He looked
> to
> > > > Windlord.
> > > > "Listen..if at all possible i need a lab...the faster i get
> into one
> > > > the faster i can help get some defense on this base...
> > > >
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > > > > Trinity::
> > > > >
> > > > > Trinity left dinning room and she saw Grounded following
> > > > > Windlord "Heya!!!!! " said Trinity to both bots.
> > > > >
> > > > > "HEllo Kitty-bot" replied Windlord while he smiled.
> > > > >
> > > > > "Who's he?" said Trinity looking Grounded.
> > > > >
> > > > > "A new friend"answered Windlord
> > > > >
> > > > >
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > > > > > ::Grounded::
> > > > > > Grounded followed the bot into the base...
> > > > > >
> > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> > > > > > > Windlord::
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > "Well..." said the male "Come in"
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > Windlord came in Chivtron's base
> > > > > > >   ----- Original Message -----
> > > > > > >   From: gunthers8@n...
> > > > > > >   To: nbwrpg@y...
> > > > > > >   Sent: Wednesday, April 04, 2001 12:10 AM
> > > > > > >   Subject: Re: meeting a old friend
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > >   ::Grounded::
> > > > > > >   "I agree"
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > >   --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > > > > > >   > Windlord::
> > > > > > >   >
> > > > > > >   > "We should speak about inside base" said Windlord "I
> think
> > > > > that will
> > > > > > >   > be good idea visit them... By now I think that the
> best is
> > > > > come in
> > > > > > >   > and speak inside the base "
> > > > > > >   >
> > > > > > >   >
> > > > > > >   >
> > > > > > >   >
> > > > > > >   > --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > > > > > >   > > ::Grounded::
> > > > > > >   > > "Defense is my middle name..well not really but it
> could
> > > > > be, if I
> > > > > > >   > > could I ahve decided to join, you seem like fair
> bots
> > > much
> > > > > > like the
> > > > > > >   > > maximals i once fought with. I can handle the guns
> in
> > > the
> > > > > mountain
> > > > > > >   > > sides and mines and such. And once if I cna get
> into a
> > > lab
> > > > > for
> > > > > > a day
> > > > > > >   > > to re-do my body the holes would be no problem at
> all
> > > for
> > > > > what I
> > > > > > >   > ahve
> > > > > > >   > > in mind.
> > > > > > >   > >
> > > > > > >   > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> > > > > > >   > > > OOC: I'm not exactly sure where Aerotaur is but I
> hope
> > > > > this is
> > > > > > >   > close
> > > > > > >   > > enough.
> > > > > > >   > > > If these shields are beyond the rules let me know.
> > > > > > >   > > >
> > > > > > >   > > > ::Aerotaur::
> > > > > > >   > > >     He walks up to where Angel Prime, Windlord,
> and
> > > > > Grounded
> > > > > > are.
> > > > > > >   > > "Hello.  I
> > > > > > >   > > > hope you're considering joining us.  Both of you.
> > > > > Although
> > > > > > it may
> > > > > > >   > > be a bit
> > > > > > >   > > > dull for you Angel Prime.  We don't get many
> attacks
> > > way
> > > > > out
> > > > > > here.
> > > > > > >   > > And we
> > > > > > >   > > > aren't equipped to attack anyone.  But we could
> really
> > > > > use the
> > > > > > >   > help.
> > > > > > >   > >  We need
> > > > > > >   > > > to get some shields on this base."
> > > > > > >   > > >
> > > > > > >   > > > ::Obfucious::
> > > > > > >   > > >     Still standing outside the base, "Sirs I've
> been
> > > > > thinking
> > > > > > >   > about
> > > > > > >   > > this
> > > > > > >   > > > problem.  I think I can develop a different type
> of
> > > > > > shielding for
> > > > > > >   > > the base.
> > > > > > >   > > > It wouldn't be the best but it might work.  First
> we'd
> > > > > need
> > > > > > >   > typical
> > > > > > >   > > force
> > > > > > >   > > > type shielding for use against missiles, lasers,
> > > > > etceteras.
> > > > > > >   > Second
> > > > > > >   > > a type of
> > > > > > >   > > > back up shielding.  It wouldn't affect incoming
> > > attacks
> > > > > but it
> > > > > > >   > would
> > > > > > >   > > affect
> > > > > > >   > > > the incoming attackers.  A typical shield system
> uses
> > > a
> > > > > > bubble of
> > > > > > >   > > force to
> > > > > > >   > > > stop attacks. But deflecting them takes energy and
> > > they
> > > > > can be
> > > > > > >   > > brought down.
> > > > > > >   > > > I propose focusing energon in such a way that it
> > > creates a
> > > > > > bubble
> > > > > > >   > of an
> > > > > > >   > > > energon field around the base.  This would prevent
> > > bots
> > > > > from
> > > > > > >   > getting
> > > > > > >   > > through.
> > > > > > >   > > >  Unfortunately the instability would mean we
> couldn't
> > > get
> > > > > out
> > > > > > >   > while
> > > > > > >   > > they're
> > > > > > >   > > > up.  We would have to attack from well within the
> > > bubble
> > > > > to
> > > > > > >   > prevent
> > > > > > >   > > stasis
> > > > > > >   > > > lock.  Our shots will still be able to pass
> through
> > > the
> > > > > > shielding
> > > > > > >   > > but theirs
> > > > > > >   > > > would not.  And the energon shields would last
> until
> > > the
> > > > > energon
> > > > > > >   > > power source
> > > > > > >   > > > ran out.  It wouldn't last more than a day or two
> but
> > > > > that would
> > > > > > >   > be
> > > > > > >   > > enough to
> > > > > > >   > > > repair and get back to battle."
> > > > > > >   > > >
> > > > > > >   > > >     "Next for weapon systems we'll need automated
> > > turrets.
> > > > > > >   > Mounted
> > > > > > >   > > in the
> > > > > > >   > > > mountain side and around the base.  I'd also like
> a
> > > mine
> > > > > field
> > > > > > >   > but that
> > > > > > >   > > > wouldn't be necessary.  Maybe some more primitive
> > > traps,
> > > > > > like the
> > > > > > >   > > hole we're
> > > > > > >   > > > one step to the right of, or the logs.  They're
> > > primitive
> > > > > but
> > > > > > >   > > effective."
> > > > > > >   > > >
> > > > > > >   > > >     "The shielding I can modify and repair from
> spare
> > > > > parts
> > > > > > in the
> > > > > > >   > > base but I
> > > > > > >   > > > don't think I can make turrets from anything in
> there.
> > > > > I'll
> > > > > > need
> > > > > > >   > at
> > > > > > >   > > least
> > > > > > >   > > > one example and some spare parts to build more
> with."
> > > > > > >   > > >
> > > > > > >   > > > ::Aerotaur::
> > > > > > >   > > >     "I think it's time we visit the Maximals again
> > > > > Windlord.
> > > > > >  They
> > > > > > >   > > owe us a
> > > > > > >   > > > favor or two."
> > > > > > >
